div.p: Beliefs guide behavior. Subsequently, to achieve anything you must have beliefs that serve as a foundation through the good and bad times. These are the true north of our organization's compass. Our beliefs about children and learning are:

ul.li: We believe that all children can learn.
We believe that success follows a child's ability to read, write, and apply arithmetic.
We believe that to be successful a child must develop character.
We believe that the learning environment must be safe and secure.
We believe that educational programs must be individualized and instruction varied.
We believe in seeking out, inducting and educating the best available staff.

div.em: A community invested in empowering our students to strive for excellence to succeed in the future.

hr.em: Every student will experience success and positively impact the world.
